The Chief Government W; Yhip will be appointed later.
I propose to appoint a small Cabinet Committee of senior
Ministers, including the Treasurer, to work on the formulation of
economic policy. It will conduct discussions with representatives of
industry in its various aspects, and will put itself in a position to
report to and advise Cabinet upon any proposed economic measures.
The first twelve ministers named will constitute the Cabinet.
CANBERRA. 22nd December, 1961
Ministers in Cabinet
